title: Installation issue: py-tensorflow@2.1 (power9)
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

Tensorflow build on power9 (lassen.llnl) simply hangs (waited ~12 hours before canceling).

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install -v py-tensorflow@2.1.0~cuda~nccl
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

* **Spack:** 0.11.2-9807-5771441ec
* **Python:** 3.7.2
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power9le

**Note:** There seems to be a bug in the version reported. I am working off of v0.16.0. See the output of `git log`

```
5771441ec (Tue Dec 22 09:05:48 2020 -0800) | small fix in tensorflow package (HEAD -> fix/bazel+tf, origin/fix/bazel+tf) [Harsh Bhatia]
0a1499ed3 (Wed Dec 16 01:24:59 2020 -0800) | fix bazel on power9 [Harsh Bhatia]
77d9acb07 (Wed Nov 18 01:30:27 2020 -0800) | update CHANGELOG.md for v0.16.0 [Todd Gamblin]
82383093e (Wed Nov 18 01:31:45 2020 -0800) | bump version number to 0.16.0 [Todd Gamblin]
532fc40e9 (Wed Nov 18 13:21:55 2020 +0100) | clingo: add `master` branch version (#19958) [Massimiliano Culpo]
20367e472 (Wed Nov 18 12:20:56 2020 +0100) | cmd: add `spack mark` command (#16662) [Michael Kuhn]
77b2e578e (Wed Nov 18 02:39:02 2020 -0800) | spack test (#15702) [Greg Becker]
```

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

The installation hangs at this point. Here, I reproduced the issue and interrupted to grab the log.
```
INFO: Analyzed target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package (303 packages loaded, 24805 targets configured).
INFO: Found 1 target...

==> Error: Failed to install py-tensorflow due to KeyboardInterrupt:
==> Error: Exception occurred in writer daemon!
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/gapps/mummi/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 742, in _writer_daemon
    rlist, _, _ = _retry(select.select)(istreams, [], [], 1e-1)
  File "/usr/gapps/mummi/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/tty/log.py", line 825, in wrapped
    return function(*args, **kwargs)
KeyboardInterrupt

==> Error: Keyboard interrupt.
```
<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5731278/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5731279/spack-build-env.txt)
